title: cross_check_genes
description: Cross-check genes with pre-trained scGPT model.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. The input h5mu file containing of pre-processed data
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. The input h5mu file containing of pre-processed data.

modality.description: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. The modality key of the MuData object containing the RNA AnnData object
modality.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. The modality key of the MuData object containing the RNA AnnData object.

vocab_file.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `resources_test/scgpt/vocab.json`. Model vocabulary file path
vocab_file.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `resources_test/scgpt/vocab.json`. Model vocabulary file path.

input_var_gene_names.description: Type: `string`, example: `gene_name`. The name of the adata
input_var_gene_names.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `gene_name`. The name of the adata.var column containing gene names. By default the .var index will be used.

var_input.help_text: Type: `string`. .var column containing highly variable genes. If provided, will only cross-check HVG filtered genes with model vocabulary.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. The output cross-checked anndata file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. The output cross-checked anndata file.

output_var_filter.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `id_in_vocab`. In which .var slot to store a boolean array corresponding to which observations should be filtered out based on HVG and model vocabulary.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects
output_compression.help_text:
Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects.
By default no compression is applied.

pad_token.description: Type: `string`, default: `<pad>`. The padding token used in the model
pad_token.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `<pad>`. The padding token used in the model.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
